TopicTitle: Is it possible to refuel a vessel from a ground base?

Articles.Content: Is it possible to refuel a vessel while landed near a ground base? Is there a "fuel hose" mod for that, perhaps? Besides some fancy flying maneuvers to dock to a ground station, of course, I'm not capable of that  Thanks!
KIS might the mod you're looking for. *waves hand like a jedi*
Thanks! I was planning to check out KIS and KAS anyway, just never got around to that. Good suggestion. I'll try tonight. Cheers!

You can also use a fuel rover. It a rover that has 2 klaws on both sides, and a fuel tank in the middle as the body. transfer fuel from base into rover, attach rover to ship (since the klaw doesn't need any extra docking port on the ship) and transfer fuel from rover to ship. It might take a few trips though depending on how much fuel the rover holds + how much you need on the rocket.

some option:

various mods in the last thread, EVA Resource Transfer its the one you are looking for.

For refuelling I use EVA Resource Transfer, the advantage its that the vessels remain separated (no wobble problems)

Sweet, thank you:)

EVA Transfer

"A single-purpose addon that allows for resource transfer between two disconnected vessels using an EVA-attachable resource transfer pipe."

Yup, looks like exactly what I want! I hope it works with 1.2.2.
